title: How To Test Your Voice AI Agent in iMash
lede: This guide explains how to test your AI agent in Imash, either directly through the Agent Builder or by making a demo phone call to ensure everything is working correctly.

steps.title: Test in Agent Builder
steps.content:
1. Open the AI Agent Builder for a new or existing agent.
  2. Locate the Test Agent Window.
  3. Click Connect to start a test conversation with your agent.
  4. If the Test Agent Window is hidden, click on Test Agent first to reveal it.
  5. Begin speaking with the agent to confirm that configuration and conversation flow are working properly.

steps.title: Test with a Phone Call
steps.content:
1. From any window locate the Phone button at the top right.
  2. Select which telephone number to call from.
  3. Select the agent you want to test.
  4. Call yourself.
  5. Start the call and have a live conversation with the agent to verify it functions correctly in a real phone call scenario.

nextSteps.title: What's Next?
nextSteps.description: After testing your agent, you can expand its capabilities:

cards.title: Add Tools to Your Agent
cards.description: Enhance your agent with predefined or custom tools for added functionality.

cards.title: Configure a Knowledge Base
cards.description: Upload documents and FAQs to give your agent context-specific knowledge.

cards.title: Use MCP Servers
cards.description: Bundle flows and tools into an MCP server and connect them to your agent.
